FuncDef: This command configures a routing protocol as a match criterion for a route policy statement entry. This command is used for both import and export policies depending how it is used.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the protocol name to match on. Values-direct, static, bgp, isis, ospf, rip, aggregate, bgp-vpn, igmp, pim, ospf3, ldp, sub-mgmt, mld, managed, vpn-leak, nat, periodic, ipsec, dhcpv6-pd, dhcpv6-na, dhcpv6-ta, dhcpv6-pd-excl, ripng, bgp-label, direct-interface, arp-nd.
Specifies the OSPF, OSPF3, or IS-IS instance. Values-isis-inst - 0 to 31.
Keyword used only with OSPF or IS-IS that specifies all instances.
